p: Crisis is often the catalyst for ingenuity. Depending on outcomes, we suspect that South Africa will ultimately return to a combination of the old and the new model of care. Stable ARV patients will be empowered to live their lives with 3–6 month supplies of medication and minimal clinic interaction. Those struggling with ARV adherence should be reabsorbed into multi-disciplinary teams to meet their medical, psychological, and social needs. Universal HIV testing should be implemented and TLD should be offered to all eligible PLHIV given its limited side effects and greater accessibility.
